articles.title: New Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra camera leak brings glad tidings to expectant fans - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: Typically reliable leaker Ice Universe has now confirmed one detail about Samsung's next-gen range-topper, the Galaxy S23 Ultra. The flagship will, indeed, sport a 200 MP camera but that sensor has yet to be announced.
articles.content: The Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra has been hailed for its camera performance, leaving Samsung with quite the daunting task of delivering a device that outperforms it next year. The Galaxy S23 Ultra could … [+1010 chars]
